subject: Re: [junit] Re: The Software Inferno - Convincing management of the benefits of unit tests
msgSnippet: ... Bravo. You have cut to the heart of the matter. Oh, and he was also basically suggesting that what *we* call unit tests were too low level to worry about.
messageBody:
On 10/3/06, Michael Feathers <mfeathers@...> wrote:

> I think that the controversial part of this is that you'd call those
> system tests "unit tests."

Bravo. You have cut to the heart of the matter. Oh, and he was also
basically suggesting that what *we* call unit tests were too low level
to worry about.

Simon
